meanings.definition: The rate at which someone or something moves or operates.
meanings.sent1: The speeds of the cars on the highway vary.
meanings.sent2: The cheetah's speeds are impressive as it chases its prey.
meanings.sent3: The snail envied the speeds of the rabbit in the race.
meanings.sent4: The speeds of the river's current carried the boat swiftly downstream.
meanings.sent5: The speeds of the roller coaster made my heart race with excitement.

meanings.sent1: She speeds through her homework to go play outside.
meanings.sent2: The athlete speeds towards the finish line in the race.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel speeds up the tree to escape the chasing cat.
meanings.sent4: Time speeds by when you're having fun with friends.
meanings.sent5: The wind speeds through the open window, cooling the room.

meanings.definition: The rate at which something happens or is done.
meanings.sent1: The speeds of production at the factory have increased.
meanings.sent2: The speeds of the internet connection affect online gaming.
meanings.sent3: The speeds of the clock's hands seemed to slow down during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent4: The speeds of the assembly line determine the efficiency of the manufacturing process.
meanings.sent5: The speeds of the dancers' movements were perfectly synchronized.
